events.title: Rameshwaram  Dhanushkodi Pilgrimage Tour
events.details: Spiritual journey to the sacred Rameshwaram temple and the ghost town of Dhanushkodi. Experience the confluence of Bay of Bengal and Indian Ocean.lt;Includes:lt Coach bus transport, accommodation, and temple visits with guide.
